message: Every love story is beautiful, but ours is my favorite. From the moment we met, I knew there was something special about you. Your smile brightens my darkest days and your love fills my heart with joy. I'm so grateful to have you by my side, today and always.

memories.title: Our First Date
memories.description: We met at that little coffee shop downtown. I was nervous, but you made me feel at ease with your warm smile and easy conversation.

memories.title: First Christmas Together
memories.description: Our first Christmas was magical, even though we couldn't travel. We made cookies, watched holiday movies, and created our own traditions.

memories.title: One Year Anniversary
memories.description: I can't believe how quickly a year went by! We celebrated with a picnic in the park where we had our first date.

memories.title: Valentine's Getaway
memories.description: The weekend at the mountain cabin was perfect. No phones, no distractions, just us and the beautiful snowy landscape.

finalNote: Every day with you is a gift I cherish. I look forward to creating many more beautiful memories together. No matter what life brings, I know we'll face it together, hand in hand.
